extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the system is affected by checking the installed version of Veeam ONE.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by CVE-2023-38547 or CVE-2023-38548?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Veeam ONE Hotfixes
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the recommended hotfixes for Veeam ONE as per Veeam's guidance to mitigate the vulnerabilities.
